name: High Backcliff
culture_adjustments: boat-kinship shifted toward haul/crew lineages (landed crews)
tide rites incorporate echo-chanting from cliff ledges
navigation lore emphasizes wind-read and cliff-signs over reef-chants
ancestor rites use cliff ledge cairns and cairn-votives
constraints: high cost to build/maintain cliff haul infrastructure
ritual work vulnerable to reagent supply disruptions
notes: preferred site for wind-drying reagents and salted goods
sacred burial ledges restrict large-scale coastal works
